Global High Resolution Population Denominators Project - Funded by The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (OPP1134076). https://dx.doi.org/10.5258/SOTON/WP00675

All the percentages for electoral demographics are calculated by Tindak Malaysia using Electoral Roll data. There is no official ethnic demographic data. All ethnic data is an estimate. Orang Kurang Upaya (OKU) or People with Disabilities (PWD) count is an estimate. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
